Bash(npm uninstall fluent-ffmpeg)
Bash(git add:*)

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add MP4 to APNG conversion for animated Discord stickers

Implemented video processing to convert MP4 files to animated stickers:
- Installed ffmpeg-static for FFmpeg binary management
- Created videoService.js with MP4 to APNG conversion
- Converts videos to 320x320px APNG format
- Limits duration to 5 seconds, 30 FPS for Discord
- Compresses to stay under 500KB limit
- Preserves animation with transparent backgrounds

Changes:
- Added ffmpeg-static v6.1.1 for video processing
- Created videoService.js with convertMP4ToAPNG function
- Modified actionHandler.js to detect and process video URLs
- Added video info extraction (duration, resolution, FPS)
- Supports progressive compression for large videos

Users can now upload MP4 videos and Sunny will automatically
convert them to animated APNG stickers that meet Discord requirements.

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
